QueryResult.text: SELECT 0 RESOURCE_KEY, u.id USER_KEY, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_UID, 1 GLOBAL_VIEW_RIGHT FROM cmn_sec_users u JOIN DWH_RES_SEC_GBL_PERMS_V s ON u.id = s.user_key WHERE u.user_status_id = 200 UNION SELECT s.object_instance_id RESOURCE_KEY, u.id USER_KEY, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_UID, 0 GLOBAL_VIEW_RIGHT FROM cmn_sec_users u JOIN DWH_RES_SEC_EXTRACT_V0 s ON (u.id = s.user_id and not exists ( select 1 from DWH_RES_SEC_GBL_PERMS_V b where b.user_key=s.user_id) ) WHERE u.user_status_id = 200
